passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(1) > a > div:nth-child(2) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(2) > a > div:nth-child(2) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > ul:nth-child(2) > li:nth-child(3) > a > div:nth-child(2) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > footer:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > footer:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > footer:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > footer:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > h3:nth-child(3)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > footer:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(4) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(55) > div:nth-child(2) > header:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
